contents-list.explanation: to add people, or things together to find the total number
samples: Count the plates on the table

contents-list.explanation: a sound or combination of sounds that has a meaning and is spoken or written
to be unable to find something or someone
to or at various points in
to get or discover something or someone, that you are looking for
of or relating to the front
the system of words or signs, that people use to express thoughts and feelings to each other
any one of the 12 parts into which the year is divided
a type of reptile, that has four legs and a long body and tail
the basic metric unit of length equal to about 39.37 inches
